TopicTitle: KSC Kraken - Part X collided into building Z. Y?

Articles.Content:
Hi there,

I know this is a known issue and last time I checked there was no known solution and it's a very difficult thing to track down. If that's changed apologies, but wanted to share as much info as possible in case this helps towards the issue:

[B]KSP version:[/B] 1.0.5 (build 1028) total stock.

[B]A detailed explanation:[/B] Lift off, achieve 120K orbit. Match planes with target and Hohmann transfer to target (space station made of 2 previous "ships"). Open cargo bay doors, un-dock cargo (station module 3, itself a ship) Switch vessel focus a number of times to dock new part. Dock shuttle to station. Quick save. Undock. Quicksave. Deorbit. 33 minutes 18 seconds first collision flying high over KSC. 41 minutes 44 seconds multiple secondary collisions.

[B]A screenshot of your craft or any relevant screens:[/B]

[imgur]9ll7X[/imgur]

[B]A .craft file or save files if relevant[/B]

[URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/e3ekp0abrrr0bre/Burantastic.craft?dl=0"]Craft file (Main Ship)[/URL]
[URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/olvgdbv6ad7q17v/Sunrise%20Station%20Module%201.craft?dl=0"]Sub assembly 1[/URL]
[URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/gbvhpvb9wj3crga/Sunrise%20Station%20Module%202.craft?dl=0"]Sub Assembly 2[/URL]
[URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/6rufb35n6s3ci8f/Sunrise%20Station%20Module%203.craft?dl=0"]Sub Assembly 3[/URL]

[URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/jarfwblgvvaq59m/persistent.sfs?dl=0"]Persistent[/URL]
[URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/0ad15d38zmvurj8/quicksave.sfs?dl=0"]Quick Save[/URL]

[B][URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/l78tl6zxgoqfcea/output_log.txt?dl=0"]The ouput_log.txt or player.log file KSP creates when it launches[/URL][/B]

[B]A detailed list of system specifications[/B]

Windows 8.1 :(
Intel Core i5-4690K CPU @ 3.5GHZ
MSI Z97S SLI Krait Edition Motherboard
GTX 970 STRIX
16 GIG Hyper X Ram
Kraken X61 Cooler

[B]Are you running a clean installation, or have you updated and some of your persistence or craft files might be older versions, if so which version(s)[/B]

Craft file was carried over from the immediately previous version of 1.0.5 (the one directly before 1028)

I hope this report helps. If you need any more information I would be happy to see if I can help. If you need a flight profile/protocol for flying the ship let me know - It's particular but virtually hands free :)

Thanks!

SM Edited November 23, 2015 by Speeding Mullet
Definitely a known issue, but thank you for the extra info!

No problems at all, very happy to help :) I've also been experiencing an issue where if you quick load a quick save the craft becomes virtually uncontrollable, the control surfaces always forcing a spin. I believe it's fairly easy to replicate. Is it also well known or would you like me to try and replicate then post as a separate report? I'm pretty sure it's specific to this craft, but I can test for that with a variety of craft if it helps....

Thanks
SM

It's aways that fuel tanks which explodes... one close to Launchpad and one close to VAB...

Maybe... if we remove any slightly data of them from existence... this bug will not happens again... Is there a way to "Mod" this?
